page.title: 09HOUSING
page.content: Housing in the area comprises 159 different dwellings. Different types include: manor houses, detached, semi-detached, bungalows, farm houses,and terraced houses. The most common type of house is the detached some of which are over 100 years old. Most of the recently built properties are detached houses or bungalows. The terraced houses are the most cheapest to build and run, but no new terraced houses have been built in the area. There is a group of 7 old peoples' semi-detached bungalows in Marston built and owned by the council.
